According to the mechanics of the game, colliding with a butterfly awards points, which is in line with our goal of accumulating butterflies while keeping cocoons intact.

The current possible movements are as follows:
- To the left (5, 23) - backtracking to the previous position.
- To the right (5, 25) - there is an empty space ('.').
- Above (4, 24) - there is an empty space ('.').
- Below (6, 24) - there is a wall ('$').

Since moving left would not benefit the strategy and moving down is blocked by a wall, the best options appear to be either moving right or up. 

However, moving right (5, 25) continues the path through open spaces while also providing a chance to explore further without encountering obstacles. 

Therefore, I will choose to move right again to continue gathering butterflies and maintain momentum.
